postal_code = | area_code_type = [[Telephone numbers in Spain|Dialing code]] | area_code = | website = | footnotes = }} '''Ripollès''' is a [[Comarques of Catalonia|comarca (county)]] in Catalonia, Spain. It is located in the [[Ribes]] and [[Camprodon]] river valleys. {{As of|2001}}, its population is 25,744, about 40% of whom live in the capital, [[Ripoll]]. Ripollès borders the comarques of [[Baixa Cerdanya]], [[Berguedà]], [[Osona]], [[Garrotxa]], and – across the border in France – [[Vallespir]], [[Conflent]], and [[Alta Cerdanya]]. ==Municipalities== Populations are from 2005. *[[Campdevànol]] – pop. 3,432 *[[Campelles]] – pop. 114 *[[Camprodon]] – pop. 2,446 *[[Gombrèn]] – pop. 229 *[[Llanars]] – pop. 546 *[[Les Llosses]] – pop. 261 *[[Molló]] – pop. 336 *[[Ogassa]] – pop. 262 *[[Pardines, Girona|Pardines]] – pop. 162 *[[Planoles]] – pop. 313 *[[Queralbs]] – pop. 202 *[[Ribes de Freser]] – pop. 2,044 *[[Ripoll]] – pop. 10,762 *[[Sant Joan de les Abadesses]] – pop. 3,621 *[[Sant Pau de Segúries]] – pop. 669 *[[Setcases]] – pop. 180 *[[Toses]] – pop. 163 *[[Vallfogona de Ripollès]] – pop. 221 *[[Vilallonga de Ter]] – pop. 437 ==See also== *[[Sub-Pyrenees]] ==References== *[http://www.ine.es/inebase/cgi/um?M=%2Ft20%2Fe260%2Fa2005%2F&O=pcaxis&N=&L=0%202005 Instituto Nacional de Estadística] (in Spanish). Reference for populations of municipalities as of January 1, 2005. *[http://www.idescat.net/territ/BasicTerr?TC=3&V0=2&PDF=FALSE&V1=31&VOK=Confirmar IDESCAT: statistical information about Ripollès] (in Catalan). Reference for list of municipalities, surface area. ==External links== *[http://www.elripolles.com/ Official comarcal web site (in Catalan and Spanish)] {{Comarques of Catalonia}} {{coord|42|16|16|N|2|15|19|E|region:ES-CT_type:adm2nd_source:cawiki|display=title}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Ripolles}} [[Category:Ripollès]]
